channel.title: Overview on menziess blog
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on menziess blog

item.title: Manage Your Virtualenvs With Pipenv
item.description: In this post we will take a look at using Pipenv, a dependency manager for python, to boost your python workflow. A virtual environment is an isolated environment in which dependencies for a python project are contained.

item.title: Manage Multiple Python Versions Using Pyenv
item.description: This will be a micro-post talking about managing multiple python versions on your machine, using a tool called Pyenv. Depending on your operating system, it may be quite a hassle uninstalling and installing different python versions.

item.title: Create A Free Static Website
item.description: In this post I will walk you through all the steps that I’ve taken to create and publish this static blog website using Hugo and github pages.
